definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: However, the image itself has not been carbon dated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，耶穌遺像本身還沒有做碳年代測定。

sentences.english: Cheng invited the beggar to his home and asked an artist to draw a portrait for his father.
sentences.chinese: 就好言請到家裏，讓畫家照着給父親畫張遺像。

sentences.english: Then , sat the vase beside the portrait of his smiling face .
sentences.chinese: 然後，把花瓶放到面前微笑的丈夫的遺像旁。

sentences.english: The faker of the shroud had to be a heretic.
sentences.chinese: 裹屍布的耶穌遺像僞造者必定是個異教徒。

definition: Huanghuagang (Chrysanthemum Hill) in Guangzhou, scene of disastrous uprising of 23rd April 1911
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
to pass on the light of Buddha
Xincheng county level city in Huludao 葫蘆島|葫芦岛[Hu2 lu2 dao3], Liaoning
